title: INITIATION DAY
body_text:
A Message From "The Writer"!
I would like to welcome each and every
EastCoastDodgeball
combatant to a new era of competition and excitement with the "Rookies vs. Legends" initiative!
You will witness some of
ECD's
most thrilling, never-before-seen showdowns pitting the game's newest and brightest stars against a slew of iconic figures who helped pave the way for all those that followed. Without any further adieu, I proudly present this kick-off - -
In the first of this intriguing series of contests, comedic rookie sensation
Arthur Casbarro
goes one-on-one with arguably the single, most dangerous force to ever compete,
Kevin Fitzpatrick
. They've exchanged more than just words the last several events and will certainly intensify their brewing rivalry the old fashioned way.
From the moment he set foot on the dodgeball battleground, fearless upstart
Casbarro
forced many of his peers to turn their heads in recognition. In his captains debut, the rookie will attempt to make an even bigger name for himself at the expense of one of the all-time greats.
Born November 6, 1988
Debut November 27, 2010 | "Wall Brawl"
ECDElitist
"Fitz"
knows what it is like to stand in this type of spotlight. Having headlined some of
ECD's
most crucial outings - a
CREAMation
and season finales just to name two - one has to believe Fitzpatrick will be the solid favorite to win.
Born January 31, 1987
Debut November 5, 2005 | DODGEBALL XTWO
________________________________________
___________________
EVENT EXCLUSIVE!
As part of the 2011 calendar year, "The Writer" asks you, the
ECD
crew, to participate in several photo opportunities. Players will have the chance to star in a future promotional poster as well as help build their very own player profile. So get ready because the cameras will be out throughout!
"March Mayhem" comes to you live,
Saturday, March 26
, beginning at
3pm
. Don't miss it!
body_html:
A Message From "The Writer"!
I would like to welcome each and every EastCoastDodgeball combatant to a new era of competition and excitement with the "Rookies vs. Legends" initiative!

You will witness some of ECD's most thrilling, never-before-seen showdowns pitting the game's newest and brightest stars against a slew of iconic figures who helped pave the way for all those that followed. Without any further adieu, I proudly present this kick-off - -


In the first of this intriguing series of contests, comedic rookie sensation Arthur Casbarro goes one-on-one with arguably the single, most dangerous force to ever compete, Kevin Fitzpatrick. They've exchanged more than just words the last several events and will certainly intensify their brewing rivalry the old fashioned way.

From the moment he set foot on the dodgeball battleground, fearless upstart Casbarro forced many of his peers to turn their heads in recognition. In his captains debut, the rookie will attempt to make an even bigger name for himself at the expense of one of the all-time greats.
  • Born November 6, 1988
  • Debut November 27, 2010 | "Wall Brawl"

    ECDElitist "Fitz" knows what it is like to stand in this type of spotlight. Having headlined some of ECD's most crucial outings - a CREAMation and season finales just to name two - one has to believe Fitzpatrick will be the solid favorite to win.
  • Born January 31, 1987
  • Debut November 5, 2005 | DODGEBALL XTWO
    ___________________________________________________________

    EVENT EXCLUSIVE!

    As part of the 2011 calendar year, "The Writer" asks you, the ECD crew, to participate in several photo opportunities. Players will have the chance to star in a future promotional poster as well as help build their very own player profile. So get ready because the cameras will be out throughout!

    "March Mayhem" comes to you live, Saturday, March 26, beginning at 3pm. Don't miss it!
